Meta.title: Wildlife Tracking & Nature Exploration App | Wildscope
Meta.description: Discover wildlife, explore nature, and track animals with Wildscope's AI-powered outdoor companion app. Works offline for wilderness adventures anywhere.

Hero.title: Explore, Identify & Track Wildlife with Wildscope
Hero.subtitle: Your AI-powered nature companion for identifying plants, tracking animals, and discovering wildlife - online or offline.

About.title: The Ultimate Wildlife Identification & Nature Exploration App
About.paragraph1: Wildscope transforms how you connect with nature. Whether you're hiking mountain trails, exploring local parks, or discovering wildlife from home, our advanced AI technology helps you identify plants, track animals, and learn about ecosystems in meaningful ways.
About.paragraph2: From casual nature walks to remote wilderness expeditions, Wildscope combines powerful AI identification technology, comprehensive offline exploration tools, and a global community of nature enthusiasts to enhance your outdoor adventures.

Features.title: Wildlife Tracking & Nature Exploration Features
Features.feature1_desc: Navigate any terrain confidently with our GPS-enabled waypoint compass, decode wilderness signals with built-in tools, and access our comprehensive outdoor knowledge library—essential tools for nature exploration, all in one application.
Features.feature2_desc: Instantly identify flora, fauna, and fungi with our advanced AI recognition system. Document wildlife sightings, access detailed species information with location-specific data, high-resolution images, interactive habitat maps, and contribute to global biodiversity research.
Features.feature3_desc: Connect with passionate wildlife watchers and nature explorers worldwide. Discover remarkable wildlife sightings from fellow adventurers, visit documented locations, share observations, and inspire others with your unique nature experiences.
Features.feature4_desc: Explore natural habitats in your area or discover distant ecosystems from home. Download region data to use species identification and detailed maps completely offline—perfect for remote wilderness adventures without cell service.
Features.feature5_desc: Enhance your nature knowledge with biodiversity quizzes and location-based learning activities. Test survival skills through immersive wilderness scenarios, or create custom nature challenges to share with friends and family.
Features.feature6_desc: Consult your AI nature expert that understands your surroundings. Upload images for instant species identification, ask questions about nearby plants and animals, and receive customized guidance for your outdoor adventures—like having a professional naturalist in your pocket.

CallToAction.title: Ready to Discover Wildlife & Explore Nature?
CallToAction.subtitle: Download Wildscope and start identifying plants, tracking wildlife, and exploring natural habitats—whether in remote wilderness or your local park.

CookieBanner.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

ImpressumPage.title: Legal Notice
ImpressumPage.responsibility_title: Responsible for content according to § 55 para. 2 RStV (German law)
ImpressumPage.disclaimer_text: The contents of our site have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws pursuant to § 7 para. 1 TMG (German law). According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG (German law), as a service provider, we are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.general_info_text: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is all data that can be used to identify you personally. For detailed information on data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below.
PrivacyPage.responsible_question: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
PrivacyPage.responsible_answer: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. The contact details can be found in the legal notice of this website.
PrivacyPage.how_we_collect_title: How do we collect your data?
PrivacyPage.how_we_collect_text1: On the one hand, your data is collected when you provide it to us. This may be, for example, data that you enter in a contact form.
PrivacyPage.how_we_collect_text2: Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website by our IT systems. These are mainly technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page view). This data is collected automatically as soon as you enter this website.
PrivacyPage.data_usage_title: What do we use your data for?
PrivacyPage.data_usage_text: Some of the data is collected to ensure error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior.
PrivacyPage.your_rights_title: What rights do you have regarding your data?
PrivacyPage.your_rights_text: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data free of charge at any time. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. You also have the right, under certain circumstances, to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
PrivacyPage.data_protection_text1: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the legal data protection regulations as well as this privacy policy.
PrivacyPage.data_protection_text2: When you use this website, various personal data is collected. Personal data is data that can be used to identify you personally. This privacy policy explains what data we collect and what we use it for. It also explains how and for what purpose this happens.
PrivacyPage.responsible_party_text: The responsible party for data processing on this website is:
PrivacyPage.responsible_party_definition: The responsible party is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of the processing of personal data (e.g., names, email addresses, etc.).

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.contact_intro: Feel free to get in touch with us for any questions, feedback, or inquiries.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Wildlife Tracking
FAQ.question1: How does Wildscope compare to other nature identification apps like iNaturalist?
FAQ.answer1: While iNaturalist focuses primarily on species identification and citizen science, Wildscope offers a complete outdoor experience with additional features specifically designed for nature enthusiasts. Our app includes offline wildlife identification, GPS navigation tools for wilderness exploration, interactive learning through nature quizzes, and an AI companion that understands your environment to provide personalized guidance—making it perfect for both casual nature lovers and serious wildlife trackers.
FAQ.question2: Can I identify plants and animals offline with Wildscope?
FAQ.answer2: Yes! Once you've downloaded an area's data, Wildscope's wildlife identification, plant recognition, and detailed trail maps work completely offline. This makes the app ideal for remote wilderness adventures where internet connectivity is unavailable—ensuring you can identify species and navigate confidently anywhere in nature.
FAQ.question3: Which devices support the Wildscope nature exploration app?
FAQ.answer3: Wildscope's wildlife tracking and nature identification features are available for both iOS (iPhone/iPad) and Android devices through the App Store and Google Play Store, making it accessible for virtually all smartphone users.
FAQ.question4: Is Wildscope wildlife identification app free to use?
FAQ.answer4: Wildscope offers a free version with essential wildlife identification and nature exploration features. Our premium subscription unlocks advanced capabilities like offline species recognition, detailed habitat maps, and custom exploration routes. Check the app for current subscription options.
FAQ.question5: How accurate is Wildscope's plant and animal identification?
FAQ.answer5: Wildscope combines location data with advanced AI technology to identify wildlife and plants with high accuracy. While our recognition system continuously improves, identification accuracy varies by species, image quality, and viewing angle. We're constantly enhancing our algorithms through regular updates to provide increasingly accurate wildlife and plant identification in all environments.
FAQ.question6: Can I contribute to Wildscope's wildlife database?
FAQ.answer6: Absolutely! Wildscope thrives on community contributions. Your wildlife observations and plant identifications are securely added to our ecosystem database, improving the app's accuracy for everyone. This collaborative approach creates a comprehensive wildlife identification resource that benefits all nature enthusiasts.
FAQ.question7: Is Wildscope developed by a large tech company?
FAQ.answer7: No, Wildscope is an independent project developed by a dedicated nature enthusiast. The app is designed and maintained by a single passionate developer who prioritizes accuracy and user experience over monetization. This independent approach ensures that Wildscope remains true to its core mission: helping people connect with and understand nature without compromising user privacy or experience.
